Eligibility.EligibilityName:
Graduate Accounts are only available to individuals aged 18 or over who have:
 (a) held a Student Account;
 (b) graduated from a full time higher education course lasting at least 2 years; or
 (c) completed training as a nurse during the past 2 years.

You must use your Graduate Account as your main current account by depositing your wages

OrganisationName.LegalName: ROYAL BANK OF SCOTLAND GROUP PLC

data.ProductDescription:
Packaged current account with additional Reward element. 

Packaged Benefits include Mobile Phone Insurance (up to 2 mobiles) European Travel Insurance (22 days), Ticket Booking Service and Tastecard and Preferential Travel Money.

Reward Benefits include 3% back on household bills (Direct Debits), with an additional 1% on selected debit card spend with Reward retail partners.

FeatureDetails.FeatureDescription: Going abroad? Your Reward Silver account includes travel insurance that covers you for up to 22 days per trip. The policy also includes winter sports cover.
Your policy covers your mobile phone for theft
Our partners
